Texts.Eng: If you've picked up this message, you must be near an ^orange;Ancient Gateway^reset; - please activate it to come and find me. ^green;You can power up the Gate with ^orange;Core Fragments^reset; and a ^orange;Tricorder^reset;.
In order to fix your ship you'll need to complete ^orange;several tasks^reset;. ^green;Speak to me^reset; to begin.

My scans indicate there is some kind of ^orange;Welcome Beacon^reset; on this planet. I estimate a ^green;82% chance that it is worth investigating^reset;, and a 98% chance that you have nothing better to do.
^orange;Welcome^reset; to my Mobile Lab, traveller! Come on in and visit! I've got a big comfy couch and a medical bay if you have any nasty injuries to heal up!
